name: BTS Twist
description:
BTS Twist - A BTS Rhythm game, finally released.

How to play:
● Tap the screen, control the twister and follow the rhythm.
● Try not to fall off the tiles.

Game features:
● Always free to play.
● Stunning graphic and sound.
● Simple but hard to master.
● Fun and challenging

BTS's Members:
● Rap Monster (Kim Namjoon; 김남준) – Leader, Rapper
● Jin (Kim Seokjin; 김석진) – Vocalist
● Suga (Min Yoongi; 민윤기) – Rapper
● J-Hope (Jung Hoseok; 정호석) – Rapper, Dancer
● Jimin (Park Jimin; 박지민) – Vocalist, Dancer
● V (Kim Taehyung; 김태형) – Vocalist
● Jungkook (Jeon Jeongguk; 전정국) – Vocalist, Rapper, Dancer

Let's the music play!
And remember, you never walk alone, share the play joyful with other A.R.M.Y

Thanks for playing!
